Interface Column

AbstractColumn
public interface Column

Method Summary
 void finalizeDefn()
          This method is called once all the columns and tables in the entire schema have been created so that foreign-key references and other late-binding activities can take place.
 java.lang.String getDataClassName()
          Returns the name of the Java class that is used to store this column's data
 java.lang.String getDefaultSqlExprValue()
          Returns the SQL expression used to set the default value of this column.
 java.util.List getDependentForeignKeys()
          Returns the list of foreign keys that are dependent upon this column.
 java.lang.String getDescription()
          Return the description of this column.
 ForeignKey getForeignKey()
          Returns the @link ForeignKey object for this column or null if the column is not a foreign key reference.
 java.lang.String getName()
          Returns the name of the column as it appears in the database.
 java.lang.String getNameForMapKey()
          Returns the name of the column suitable for use as a key in a Map for runtime lookup purposes.
 Table getParentTable()
          Returns the table that owns this column.
 java.lang.String getSequenceName()
          If this column is sequenced in the database (assuming the database supports sequences), then return the sequence name or return null if the column is not sequenced.
 int getSize()
          Returns the size of this column if the column is a text or string column.
 java.lang.String getSqlDefn(java.lang.String dbms)
          Return the SQL definition that can be used to create this column for the database ID specified in the dbms parameter.

setForeignKeyRef

public void setForeignKeyRef(short type,
                             java.lang.String value)
Sets the foreign key reference for this column.
Parameters:
type - Either ForeignKey.FKEYTYPE_SELF, ForeignKey.FKEYTYPE_PARENT, or ForeignKey.FKEYTYPE_LOOKUP
value - A string in the format Table_Name.column_name that refers to an existing table and column

registerForeignKeyDependency

public void registerForeignKeyDependency(ForeignKey fKey)
Registers foreign key dependency for this column.
Parameters:
fkey - The foreign key from another table that references this column
